Class Terminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • t7.Terminal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Terminal
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class provides a shell for the language.
    Author:
    kinan
